mapper.select: select * from product order by createdAt desc
mapper.insert: insert into product (userid, title, contents, boardRegion, createdAt, img1, img2, img3, img4, img5, img6) values(#{userId}, #{title}, #{contents}, #{boardRegion}, now(), #{img1}, #{img2}, #{img3}, #{img4}, #{img5}, #{img6})
mapper.select: select * from product where ${item} like concat('%', #{search}, '%') order by createdAt desc
select * from product where boardRegion = #{boardRegion} order by createdAt desc
mapper.update: update product set reservedNow = 1 where id=#{productId}
update product set reservedNow = 0 where id=#{productId}
mapper.select: select * from product inner join zzim on product.id=zzim.productseq where zzim.memberid=#{sessionId} and zzim.zzimCheck=1 order by zzim.seq desc;
select product.id from product where product.title like concat('%', #{title}, '%') and product.boardRegion like concat('%', #{region}, '%')

select if( ((#{startDate} < all(select reservation.startrental from reservation inner join product on product.id = reservation.boardid where reservation.reservCheck=1 and product.id = #{productId} )) and (#{endDate} < all(select reservation.startrental from reservation inner join product on product.id = reservation.boardid where reservation.reservCheck=1 and product.id = #{productId} ))) or ((#{startDate} > all(select reservation.endrental from reservation inner join product on product.id = reservation.boardid where reservation.reservCheck=1 and product.id = #{productId} )) and (#{endDate} > all(select reservation.endrental from reservation inner join product on product.id = reservation.boardid where reservation.reservCheck=1 and product.id = #{productId} ))) , #{productId}, 0 );
